A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was very entertained\, that graphics was nice but....the storyline did not make sense at all to me.  It seemed like the director just threw every idea that came to mind  into one movie.  I'm giving it a star because I was entertained\, a movie can go on for so long before I get tired of watching\, and another star for graphics and the animals and scenery and one more star that will equal 3 stars just because I am a star wars fan.
